title: "Julius Caesar" Shakespeare; audio/abridged; with Peter Finch

sources.title: JuliusCaesar 20131128
sources.description: "Julius Caesar" (abridged)  by William Shakespeare cast Julius Caesar............John Moffatt Casca....................Brian Haines Calpurnia................Jennie Goossens Marcus Antonius..........Peter Finch Soothsayer...............Dennis Shaw Marcus Brutus............Patrick Wymark Cassius..................Tenniel Evans Narrator.................Dennis Vance Decius Brutus............Peter Williams Cinna....................Peter Ellis Trebonius................George Yeatman Servant..................Peter Williams Publius..................Denis Shaw Metellus Cimber..........Brian Hawksley 3rd Conspirator..........Denis Shaw 2nd Conspirator..........Denis Shaw 1st Conspirator..........Brian Haines 4th COnspirator..........Bill Horsley Massala..................Brian Hawksley Octavius Caesar..........George Yeatman Pindarus.................Brian Haines Titinius.................Peter Ellis Directed by Dennis Vance. Script adapted by Morys Aberdare and Dennis  Vance. Musique Concrete and Sound Effects by Desmond Leslie. Sound  Supervision Cyril Ornadel. Collectors' Library of Great Shakespeare Plays -- Murray Hill (aka  "Living Shakespeare") William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, www.gunjones.com
